thread.section_title: 1001 Modelkits Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1001 Modelkits | www.1001modelkits.com
thread.title: Darren Whyte

author: Darren Whyte
title: Darren Whyte
text: Good were only shipped after nearly 2 weeks ( despite showing as in stock ), they were only shipped after I said to cancel the order. Up until that point all I was getting told was that the goods will be sent soon. Furthermore the goods weren't sent by royal mail but by hermes , they very rarely deliver down my road. Oh and the items were left on my doorstep.
